resources.string: Private content not available. Any content currently being moved to Private will not be moved.
Unable to disable Private mode. Try again.
Draw your pattern for Private mode.
Hide personal content. To use this mode, select an unlock method. Disable this mode after use to protect the hidden content.
Enter the PIN used as an alternative to your pattern.
Private mode disabled. Any content currently being moved to Private will not be moved.
Failed to enable Private mode. Try again.
You have drawn an incorrect pattern. Try again.
You have entered an incorrect PIN. Try again.
You have entered an incorrect password. Try again.
Enter your PIN for Private mode.
Any open content will be closed. Any changes that you have not saved will be discarded.
To enhance security while using Private mode, we recommend you change your screen lock type to a secure method, then enable Private mode.
Private Mode will be activated when the selected content is transferred.

"Disclaimer Please be aware that content may appear in a separate folder in your device when it is automatically synchronized by a third-party application, such as Dropbox. Check the auto-synchronization settings for your other applications before using Private Mode."
Another process already in progress. Try again after it finishes.
Private mode will be enabled while the selected content is moved to Private, and disabled again once the transfer is complete.

"Private mode will be enabled while the selected applications are moved to Private, and disabled again once the transfer is complete.
Moving applications to Private will also move their linked applications and related widgets, and delete their shortcuts. While Private mode is disabled, you will not receive notifications from the applications you moved to Private."
Your fingerprint settings have been changed. Draw your Double verification pattern to enable Private mode.
Your fingerprint settings have been changed. Enter your Double verification PIN to enable Private mode.
Your fingerprint settings have been changed. Enter your Double verification password to enable Private mode.
Set a pattern, PIN, or password to use as an alternative to your fingerprints to access Private mode.
